metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000364 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the size of the stack guard page on Linux,specifically a 4k stack guard page is not sufficiently large and can be"jumped" over (the stack guard page is bypassed), this affects Linux Kernelversions 4.11.5 and earlier (the stackguard page was introduced in 2010).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-81-generic - 4.4.0-81.104
linux-image-4.4.0-81-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-81.104
